Class ComputerStore

java.lang.Object
  ComputerStore

public class ComputerStore
extends java.lang.Object

A class ComputerStore to represent a store that stores a list of computers,and components. The methods are to add ,remove computers or components, to print all the computers , to get the total cost of them, and to get the total cost of all components .

Version:
(2017-01-28)
Author:
(Lana Barikhan)
